==German== ===Etymology=== {{compound|de|frei|Zeit|t1=free|t2=time}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|de|De-Freizeit.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f}} (''Abbreviation'': '''Frzt.''') # [[free time]], [[leisure]] time, spare time. The time during which one is not working. #: {{ux|de|Zeitung lesen kannst du in deiner '''Freizeit'''.|t=You can read the newspaper in your '''free time'''.}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|en}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|Feierabend}}, {{l|de|Ferien}}, {{l|de|Mußestunden}}, {{l|de|Mußezeit}}, {{l|de|Urlaub}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|freizeitlich}} * {{l|de|Freizeitzentrum|g=n}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Arbeit}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
